query.text: Which events occurred that acted on a spoon?

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'Spoon'), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'GraspingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'bodyPartsUsed',PART), owl_individual_of(PART, knowrob:'AnimalBodyPart').
query.text: Which body part(s) were used for spoon grasping events?

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'Spoon'), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'GraspingSomething'), forth_task_start(EVENT,T0), visualize_forth_experiment(T0).
query.text: How was the human pose when spoon grasping event is started?

query.q: owl_individual_of(T, knowrob:'GraspingSomething'), owl_individual_of(S, knowrob:'Spoon-SilverwarePiece'), owl_has(T, knowrob:'objectActedOn', S), forth_task_start(T, ST), forth_task_end(T, ET), remove_trajectory('/right_hand'), add_trajectory('right_hand', ST, ET, 0.1, 2).
query.text: How was the trajectory of the spoon during grasp?

query.q: owl_individual_of(T, knowrob:'Walking-Generic'), forth_task_start(T, ST), forth_task_end(T, ET), remove_trajectory('/hip'), add_trajectory('hip', ST, ET, 0.1, 2).
query.text: How was the trajectory of hip during walking?

query.q: owl_individual_of(A, knowrob:'PouringSomethingOnto'), owl_has(A,knowrob:'startTime',T0), owl_has(A,knowrob:'endTime',T1), visualize_forth_experiment(T0), owl_has(A,knowrob:'bodyPartsUsed',PART), owl_has(PART, srdl2comp:'urdfName', literal(URDF)), atom_concat('/', URDF, _Link), remove_trajectory(_Link), add_trajectory(URDF, T0, T1, 0.1).
query.text: How was the trajectory of endeffectors during pouring actions?

query.q: experiment(_HumanExperiment), experiment_start(_HumanExperiment, _S), experiment_end(_HumanExperiment, _E), time_term(_S, _ST), time_term(_E, _ET), Duration is _ET - _ST.
query.text: How much time is spent by human to make the experiment ?
